trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around November 30th 1992
divs: sighting detailsi prefer to elaborate on details of what i witnessed to a person rather than this written account...but here is a briefing: it was some time ago, and i hope in writing this...mufon might confirm my story with other accounts that have been reported in relative time & event description. also, let me preface my account with the fact of my account is based soley on my memory. i have no photographic evidence, and no written notes. i am a 35-year old (professionaly employed) male with some piloting experience. i also have never been treated for any sort of mental or psychological impairment. i do not use drugs or alcohol (never have, never will) ...that being said, here is my story: i estimate the date was (approx.) 1993, i was about 19-years old at the time. i observed a very bright light hovering in the area of ne philadelphia, near the northeast airport. my attention was immediately drawn to this light over other lights in the area because iof it being much brighter than the rest in comparison. i continued to watch the bright light for approx. 5 minutes before watching is ascend higher into the sky. it appeared to me that the aircraft was only at about 3,000 feet in altitude. the aircraft rose in a perfectly straight vertical ascension above everything else in sight. after it's ascension, the aircraft appeared to stay hovering once again in the same spot for a few moments before moving directly towards me (i was in the 3rd floor bedroom of the house i grew up in) traveling in a eastbound direction. as the aircraft approached, i had a much better look at it. it was directly overhead of me. i had a clear vision of the aircraft - a very large disc shaped object with a single bright light in the center & a lit outer edge. it appeared that the aircraft was as large as a football field (or maybe the size of the entire street i was on). it had no propellers, and it had no wings. as the aircraft passed overhead and continued to travel in an eastbound direction, it diverted it's course to a southbound\upward direction - in an extremely fast menner (i would best describe the way it left was like watching a rubber-band being flung across a room). i immediately phoned my father (who was at work as a police officer) to tell what i saw. my father suggested that i call the northeast airport and ask if they had any information. well, to my dismay, i don't think that the northeast airport took me seriously...because they asked ignorant questions like, "was the ufo operated by little green men too, sir?" again, i phoned my father and told him that the northeast airport had nopthing to offer. next, he suggested that i call 9-1-1. i did. the 9-1-1 operator told me that there was nothing they could do...but my call was "the 10th call in the past minute about this". 9-1-1 also gave me a phone number to a ufo-hotline. i called the number the naxt day, but never followed up with any more interviews or comments because i didn't want to waste my time telling this story to some "science-fiction" enthusiast who might be eager to believe anything & everything about ufo's. ...as you can see, i am cautious when telling this story because of the mixed reactions i might get. i am simply writing this because i am sick of people discounting the fact that there might be something else out there, and sick of cover-ups, etc. i hope that this letter makes it's way to someone else who saw what i did. maybe there is someone else who has reported this (or who has yet to be interviewed) that can cooberrate my account. ...too bad cell phones, videocameras, & other cool technology wasn't at our ready back then, huh? i am available via email or phone call for future discussion.
Summary: Bright lit disc shaped object in the air.
